edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a library object which performs various functions common to lending libraries. Manages various kinds of media and the library patrons.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Library(java.lang.String branch)
      Constructs a library object with a branch specifier.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(LibraryItem item)
      Adds a new object to the library collection.

      Adds a new patron and returns a unique library number.

      Checks an item back into the library.
      void checkout(LibraryItem item, int libraryCardNumber)
      Checks out an item from the library.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,LibraryItem> getCheckedOutItems()
      Returns the HashMap containing all checked out items.
      java.util.ArrayList<Patron> getLibraryMembers()
      Returns a list of all library patrons.
      java.util.List<LibraryItem> getListOfAllLibraryItems()
      Returns the ArrayList containing all items in the library collection.

      Checks to see if an item is currently checked out.

      Prints the list of available media bindings.

      • add

        public void add(LibraryItem item)
         throws edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.LibraryException
        Adds a new object to the library collection.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to add.
        Throws:
        LibraryException - If the item is already contained in the library.

      • remove

        public void remove(LibraryItem item)
            throws edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.LibraryException,
                   edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.CheckInOutException
        Removes an item from the library's collection.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to remove.
        Throws:
        LibraryException - If the item is not in the library collection.
        CheckInOutException - If the item is currently checked out.

      • addPatron

        public int addPatron(java.lang.String name)
              throws PatronException
        Adds a new patron and returns a unique library number.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the patron to be added.
        Returns:
        A unique library ID number assigned to the patron.
        Throws:
        PatronException - If the name is already exists in the list of patrons.

      • removePatron

        public boolean removePatron(int libraryCardNumber)
        Removes a patron from the list of library patrons.
        Parameters:
        libraryCardNumber - The ID number of the patron to be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the patron was successfully removed.

      • checkout

        public void checkout(LibraryItem item,
            int libraryCardNumber)
              throws edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.LibraryException,
                     edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.CheckInOutException
        Checks out an item from the library.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be checked out.
        libraryCardNumber - The ID number of the patron who is checking out the item.
        Throws:
        LibraryException - If the item is not listed as part of the library collection.
        CheckInOutException - If the item is already checked out.

      • checkin

        public void checkin(LibraryItem item)
             throws edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.LibraryException,
                    edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.CheckInOutException
        Checks an item back into the library.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check in.
        Throws:
        LibraryException - If the item is not listed as part of the library collection.
        CheckInOutException - If the item is not checked out.

      • isCheckout

        public boolean isCheckout(LibraryItem item)
                   throws edu.washington.ext.libraryproject.controller.LibraryException
        Checks to see if an item is currently checked out.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check.
        Returns:
        True if the item is checked out; False if the item is not checked out.
        Throws:
        LibraryException - If the item is not listed in the library collection.
